product_name: PRO-TEC IPS Low-Profile Hip Pads - Men's
long_description: These PRO-TEC IPS Low-Profile hip pads have a slim-fitting, low profile, stretch fit. They offer extra protection without advertising their presence to the world! Strategically placed padding helps protect hips, thighs and tailbone from unexpected spills. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and promotes breathability. Features anatomic stretch-fit construction in a flexible lightweight, breathable design; the shorts move with you without inhibiting performance. PRO-TEC IPS Low-Profile hip pad are machine washable.
short_description: These PRO-TEC IPS Low-Profile hip pads have a slim-fitting, low profile, stretch fit. They offer extra protection without advertising their presence to the world!
